head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HOFFMAN, IDA SILVERMAN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HOFFMAN, IDA SILVERMAN

block.p: HOFFMAN--Ida Silverman, age 95, on April 21, 2005. A true original who fully enjoyed life. Wife of Martin, sister of Michael and Ethel Silverman and Bertha Smith, and adored aunt, great-aunt and great-great-aunt not only to her family but to the many who delighted in knowing her. The family and friends to whom she was devoted will miss her greatly.
